name: part_012
file: tmp_【#天音かなた卒業ライブ】「絶対的アイドル」 ⧸ Amane Kanata Graduation LIVE ＂THE ABSOLUTE IDOL＂【hololive】 [8iGGL_0CEpc]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performing the song 'Tokusha Seizon Wonder-la-der!!' on stage with a light stick audience.
MC section. Kanata thanks the audience, discusses the setlist, changes her outfit instantly, and does her introduction.

subtitles.original: なんだかんだそうやって
subtitles.english: Somehow, just like that,

subtitles.original: うんばばたち聞こえてる？決まってる？
subtitles.english: Umbabas, can you hear me? Are you ready?

subtitles.original: かなたちゃんドンドン全身全霊ちゃんと歓迎して
subtitles.english: Kanata-chan is rapidly advancing, welcome me with all your heart!

subtitles.original: 高まるかい？ひそひそちゃんと強打して
subtitles.english: Are you excited? Secretly, hit me hard.

subtitles.original: 興奮しよう
subtitles.english: Let's get excited!

subtitles.original: 僕が呼んだもん 本当にするんだもん
subtitles.english: I called for it, so I'll make it real!

subtitles.original: 現実超えろ未来 Ah
subtitles.english: Surpass reality, future, Ah!

subtitles.original: 弱点も癖 スイッチでラッチャ
subtitles.english: Even weaknesses are habits, flick the switch and release!

subtitles.original: すなわち特者生存ワンダラダー
subtitles.english: In other words, survival of the fittest Wonder-la-der!

subtitles.original: 楽しもう 面白がれること
subtitles.english: Let's enjoy it, finding things to be amused by...

subtitles.original: 探し放題ですね
subtitles.english: ...is an all-you-can-search buffet!

subtitles.original: 返事聞かせてくれ
subtitles.english: Let me hear your answer!

subtitles.original: 右左どっかじゃない
subtitles.english: It's not right, left, or somewhere else!

subtitles.original: 聞きつけて一直線
subtitles.english: Catch wind of it and go straight line!

subtitles.original: つまり企んだら発車オーライだ
subtitles.english: Basically, if you plotted it, it's safe to depart!

subtitles.original: ワクワク寸前 Sha!
subtitles.english: Excitement on the verge, Sha!

subtitles.original: 聞いて！
subtitles.english: Listen!

subtitles.original: みんなと離れるのが寂しいのと
subtitles.english: I'm lonely about parting with everyone and...

subtitles.original: 楽器の血行が立ち直ってません！
subtitles.english: ...my instrument's circulation hasn't recovered!

subtitles.original: 僕をアイドルにしてくれてみんな本当にありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you everyone for making me an idol!

subtitles.original: なんなんだよ そんなこと
subtitles.english: What the heck is that about?

subtitles.original: 言っちゃだめだ おバカ
subtitles.english: Don't say that, you dummy.

subtitles.original: わぁすごい ありがとう
subtitles.english: Wow, amazing, thank you!

subtitles.original: 日々是装填でGo My Way
subtitles.english: Every day is loading up, Go My Way.

subtitles.original: 虎視眈々でいたいだもん
subtitles.english: I want to be vigilant like a tiger.

subtitles.original: だって意気昂々がいいんだもん
subtitles.english: Because being in high spirits is good!

subtitles.original: 全方位でガッツリ汗をかいてら
subtitles.english: Sweating buckets in all directions!

subtitles.original: Cha!
subtitles.english: Cha!

subtitles.original: 言っても心はちゃんと純粋で
subtitles.english: Even if I say that, my heart is properly pure.

subtitles.original: 一体何個 軋マタイ不審で
subtitles.english: How many creaking suspicions on earth?

subtitles.original: 一切合切 言い聞かせるんだ
subtitles.english: I'll tell myself absolutely everything.

subtitles.original: 調子に乗ったら
subtitles.english: If I get carried away...

subtitles.original: すぐ飽きられちゃうから Ah
subtitles.english: ...you'll get tired of me right away, Ah!

subtitles.original: 解答なら程々こいで捨て
subtitles.english: If it's an answer, row moderately and discard it!

subtitles.original: すなわち特者生存ワンダラダー
subtitles.english: In other words, survival of the fittest Wonder-la-der!

subtitles.original: しがみつけ 努力と
subtitles.english: Cling on to effort!

subtitles.original: 最後まで諦めないこと メモっておいて
subtitles.english: Take a note: don't give up until the very end.

subtitles.original: 本当はBaby 自信がないよ
subtitles.english: Actually Baby, I have no confidence.

subtitles.original: 本当はBaby 不安ばっかで泣きそうだって
subtitles.english: Actually Baby, I'm just anxious and feel like crying.

subtitles.original: でもねBaby くじけないって決めたの
subtitles.english: But you know Baby, I decided I won't be discouraged.

subtitles.original: だからBaby
subtitles.english: So Baby...

subtitles.original: 挑戦したいよ 未開の天地
subtitles.english: ...I want to challenge the unexplored lands!

subtitles.original: 無限のフィールドで
subtitles.english: In this infinite field!

subtitles.original: いけー！
subtitles.english: Go!

subtitles.original: 全身全霊ちゃんと歓迎して
subtitles.english: Welcome me properly with all your heart and soul!

subtitles.original: 高まるかい？ひそひそちゃんと強打して
subtitles.english: Are you excited? Secretly, hit me hard.

subtitles.original: 興奮しよう 僕が呼んだもん
subtitles.english: Let's get excited! I called for it,

subtitles.original: 本当にするんだもん
subtitles.english: ...so I'll make it real!

subtitles.original: 現実超えろ未来 Ah
subtitles.english: Surpass reality, future, Ah!

subtitles.original: 弱点も癖 スイッチでラッチャ
subtitles.english: Even weaknesses are habits, flick the switch and release!

subtitles.original: すなわち特者生存ワンダラダー
subtitles.english: In other words, survival of the fittest Wonder-la-der!

subtitles.original: 楽しもう 面白がれること
subtitles.english: Let's enjoy it, finding things to be amused by...

subtitles.original: 探し放題ですね
subtitles.english: ...is an all-you-can-search buffet!

subtitles.original: 無限のフィールドで
subtitles.english: In the infinite field!

subtitles.original: タイミングしなくてもいい
subtitles.english: You don't even have to time it!

subtitles.original: ど真ん中一直線
subtitles.english: Dead center, straight line!

subtitles.original: つまりこれが僕の答えなんだ
subtitles.english: In short, this is my answer!

subtitles.original: 胸を張れ 今を生きるその意味を
subtitles.english: Be proud! The meaning of living in the now...

subtitles.original: 明日も明後日も確かめ進め
subtitles.english: ...confirm it tomorrow and the day after, and advance!

subtitles.original: 笑え！
subtitles.english: Smile!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: みんな！
subtitles.english: Everyone!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: はい。
subtitles.english: Yes.

subtitles.original: え、聴いていただいたのはオリ曲メドレー。
subtitles.english: Uh, what you just heard was an original song medley.

subtitles.original: メドレーにしました。繋ぎましたよ。
subtitles.english: I made it a medley. I connected them.

subtitles.original: そして「世界で一番のアイドル」、作詞をしました。
subtitles.english: And "The World's #1 Idol", I wrote the lyrics for it.

subtitles.original: この時は卒業なんて考えてなかったから...
subtitles.english: At that time, I wasn't thinking about graduation at all...

subtitles.original: 本当に... あの、いっぱい聴いてほしい曲です。
subtitles.english: Really... um, it's a song I want you to listen to a lot.

subtitles.original: そして「特者生存ワンダラダー!!」でした。
subtitles.english: And that was "Tokusha Seizon Wonder-la-der!!".

subtitles.original: はい、これは初めて... 出したね？
subtitles.english: Yes, this is the first time... I've put this out, right?

subtitles.original: オリジナル楽曲ですけれども...
subtitles.english: It's an original song, but...

subtitles.original: ちょっと語りたいこといっぱいあるんですけど...
subtitles.english: I have a lot I want to talk about regarding it...

subtitles.original: やっぱあの服だよね？ってことで...
subtitles.english: But it's gotta be that outfit, right? So...

subtitles.original: 一秒着替えしてきました。
subtitles.english: I did a one-second outfit change.

subtitles.original: はい！やっぱこれだよねみんな。
subtitles.english: Yes! It's definitely this one, everyone.

subtitles.original: へい！こんかなた〜！
subtitles.english: Hey! Kon-Kanata!

subtitles.original: キャッチコピーは握力50キロ、ぎゅうぎゅう握り潰しちゃうぞ。
subtitles.english: My catchphrase is: Grip strength 50kg, I'll crush you tight.

subtitles.original: ホロライブ4期生、かなたんこと天音かなたです。
subtitles.english: Hololive 4th Generation, Amane Kanata also known as Kanatan.

subtitles.original: はい。ということでね、ろ...
subtitles.english: Yes. So with that said, Ro...

subtitles.original: 危ないことはね、危ない橋は渡らないでおきまして。
subtitles.english: Let's not do anything dangerous, let's not cross any dangerous bridges.

subtitles.original: いうようなね、あの、感じでいきたいと思うんですけれども...
subtitles.english: I think I want to proceed with... that kind of vibe, but...

subtitles.original: もう本当にオリジナル楽曲はね...
subtitles.english: Really, regarding the original songs...
